title: Nurse Clinical Skills Training: Buttonhole Cannulation Simulation-Based E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners repeatedly practice buttonhole cannulation techniques in VR simulations resembling actual clinical environments and learn theory/procedures through e-learning. Technical proficiency is measured through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in buttonhole cannulation procedures within a VR simulation environment.
Based on knowledge acquired through e-learning modules, learners explain five complications related to cannulation and propose prevention strategies.
In team-based projects, learners design cannulation protocols for patient-specific scenarios and execute them according to evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
